Play a game of whack-a-mole inside your IDE, implemented in R.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`action()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/action.md)
  : Build an action matrix
- [`close_to()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/close_to.md)
  : Weight: how close to you to a certain point
- [`constructor_board()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/constructor_board.md)
  : Constructor for our board class
- [`density_global()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/density_global.md)
  : Weight: how many moles are near you
- [`density_local()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/density_local.md)
  : Weight: are there moles in a star-pattern around you?
- [`far_from()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/far_from.md)
  : Weight: are you farther away from somewhere?
- [`fellow_mole_below()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/fellow_mole_below.md)
  : For each cell, is there a mole below?
- [`fellow_mole_right()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/fellow_mole_right.md)
  : For each mole, is there a mole to the right?
- [`find_in_grid()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/find_in_grid.md)
  : Find the locations of elements in a grid
- [`flip()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/flip.md) :
  Flip something from 0 to 1, and vice versa
- [`greedy()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/greedy.md)
  : Weight: what's the net mole consequence of whacking you?
- [`is_solved()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/is_solved.md)
  : Is a board solved?
- [`linear_left()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/linear_left.md)
  : Weight: how far are you from the left-most column?
- [`local_sum()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/local_sum.md)
  : The number of moles on and around (i, j)
- [`make_big()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/make_big.md)
  : Add padding around a board
- [`mole_locations()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/mole_locations.md)
  : Get the locations of all moles
- [`new_board()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/new_board.md)
  : Create a new board
- [`play()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/play.md) :
  Play a game of Whack-A-Mole
- [`print(`*`<board>`*`)`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/print.board.md)
  : Print method for 'board' class
- [`radial_top_left()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/radial_top_left.md)
  : Weight: how far you are from the top-left corner?
- [`strip_edges()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/strip_edges.md)
  : Remove edges around a board
- [`whack()`](https://jjmoncus.github.io/whackamole/reference/whack.md)
  : Whack a mole at a particular location
